name: Anubhav Gupta
position: Data Engineer II @Bristol Myers Squibb | Python | Certified AWS cloud practitioner | Pyspark | Scala | Power BI | Chatbot
about: Result-oriented and highly skilled Software Engineer with a strong background in data engineering and cloud computing. Experienced in developing and deploying AWS Lambda functions, Step Functions, and Athena for efficient business processes. Proven ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and deliver high-quality solutions in fast-paced environments. Adept at leveraging Python, Power-BI, AWS, Docker, Scala, and SQL to develop robust applications and dashboards. Certified AWS Cloud Practitioner with strong problem-solving skills, seeking to contribute expertise to a dynamic team in a challenging role.

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description:
• Collaborated with the Amazon team to develop advanced ML models for AMC’s marketing team, driving growthand enhancing sales effectiveness by reducing costs associated with upselling and cross-selling by more than 20%,while delivering valuable insights for future product strategies.• Engineered and deployed 20+ AWS Lambda functions to streamline data processing tasks, tailored to diversebusiness needs, driving product growth and insights while enhancing operational efficiency and scalability.• Designed and implemented 5+ AWS-Step functions to automate various business processes, streamliningworkflows and boosting productivity.• Automated the generation and distribution of critical business reports to AMC, ensuring timely and accuratedissemination of insights.• Wrote Scala code from scratch for multiple projects, utilizing EMR and Spark to automate SQL queries with
precision and efficiency, optimizing resource utilization and driving transformative outcomes.

publications: [{"title":"Comparison between net metering and Battery Storage in reference to Rooftop Solar","subtitle":"IEEE","date":"March 28, 2021","description":"With the popularity of solar energy with the increasing awareness among the people, rooftop PVs are a great utilization of the technology as it puts the production directly in the hands of the consumers. With the concept of net and gross metering, the consumers now have the options to be the producers, by selling the extra back to supplying companies. This method along with the existing method of storing extra in the battery for later use has revolutionized the solar industry. In this paper we have tried to compare the benefits associated with both the methods and also estimated the solar panel output using Machine Leaning from available data."},{"title":"Making Biogas Smart using Internet of Things (IoT)","subtitle":"IEEE","date":"December 1, 2020","description":"The paper deals with, how the productivity and monitoring of Biogas can be done with the help of the Internet of Things (IoT)."}]
projects: [{"title":"Indoor System Localization using Wifi Fingerprinting","start_date":"Nov 2021","end_date":"May 2022","description":"Find the exact location of a receiver device (Data Collector) using the wifi network strength and Machine Learning."},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Covid-19 Chatbot","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Nov 2021","description":"A chatbot developed using the Rasa framework to provide information about the covid-19 cases in India."},{"title":"World GDP Analysis","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Oct 2021","description":"A dashboard built using Power BI to analyze the GDP of different Countries."},{"title":"Stock Price Prediction of Companies listed in NASDAQ","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"Stock Price Prediction of Companies listed in NASDAQ using LSTM model.The data is derived from yahoo and the data is collected from the past 10 years to till date, from this data 80% of data is used to train the model and rest 20% of data is used to test the model.LSTM model - Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks are a type of recurrent neural network capable of learning order dependence in sequence prediction problems. It is an artificial recurrent neural network architecture used in the field of deep learning. Unlike standard feedforward neural networks, LSTM has feedback connections. It can not only process single data points, but also entire sequences of data."},{"title":"Crypto Currency Price Prediction","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"Crypto Currency Price Prediction is done using LSTM model.In this model 80% of the data is used for training and the rset 20% is used for testing.LSTM model - Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks are a type of recurrent neural network capable of learning order dependence in sequence prediction problems. It is an artificial recurrent neural network architecture used in the field of deep learning. Unlike standard feedforward neural networks, LSTM has feedback connections. It can not only process single data points, but also entire sequences of data.Data Source - The data Source used in the notebook is extracted from https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/historical-data/?start=20130429&end=20201107 using data scrapping extension tool Instant Data Scrapper ( https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/historical-data/?start=20130429&end=20201107 ) provided in Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge. The notebook is used to for price prediction of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Binance Coin and Chainlink, apart from these other cryptocurreny price prediction can also be done, only the work reuired to be done is scrapping the data from Coinmarket using Instant Data Scrapper."}]

Clean Air Asia - Nature Hack for Clean Air
honors_and_awards.description: The project idea was to make "Biogas Smart using Internet of Things" which was selected in the top 20 out of 700 participating teams in NEC Hackathon - Environment hosted on Hacker-Earth. The project proposal was how Bio-gas Production can be increased, monitoring of Bio-gas plant and how revenue can be generated by using IoT (Internet of Things). We developed a business model for the farmers which can help them as a side income by selling the crop residue instead of burning for that developed… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: NEC - Hackathon Environment
honors_and_awards.description: The project idea was to make "Biogas Smart using Internet of Things" which was selected in the top 18 out of 1150 participating teams in NEC Hackathon - Environment hosted on Hacker-Earth. The project proposal was how Bio-gas Production can be increased, monitoring of Bio-gas plant and how revenue can be generated by using IoT (Internet of Things).
